name: UPaperGroupedSpriteComponent
doc:
A component that handles rendering and collision for many instances of one or more UPaperSprite assets.

@see UPrimitiveComponent, UPaperSprite

methods.name: AddInstance
methods.doc: Add an instance to this component. Transform can be given either in the local space of this component or world space.

methods.name: ClearInstances
methods.doc: Clear all instances being rendered by this component

methods.name: GetInstanceCount
methods.doc: Get the number of instances in this component

methods.name: GetInstanceTransform
methods.doc: Get the transform for the instance specified. Instance is returned in local space of this component unless bWorldSpace is set.  Returns True on success.

methods.name: RemoveInstance
methods.doc: Remove the instance specified. Returns True on success.

methods.name: SortInstancesAlongAxis
methods.doc: Sort all instances by their world space position along the specified axis

methods.name: UpdateInstanceColor
methods.doc: Update the color for the instance specified. Returns True on success.

methods.name: UpdateInstanceTransform
methods.doc: Update the transform for the instance specified. Instance is given in local space of this component unless bWorldSpace is set.  Returns True on success.
